tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Individualized_Education_Plans (
  student_id INT NOT NULL,
  student_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  iep_goal TEXT NOT NULL,
  iep_objectives TEXT,
  iep_reviews TEXT,
  PRIMARY KEY (student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE students (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    grade_level VARCHAR(10),
    iep_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE iep_tracking (
    iep_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT REFERENCES students(student_id),
    iep_start_date DATE,
    iep_end_date DATE,
    iep_goal VARCHAR(100),
    iep_progress VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Students (
  student_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  birthdate DATE NOT NULL,
  grade_level INT,
  iep_status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Pending'
);

CREATE TABLE Student (
    student_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    grade INT,
    date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE IEP (
    iep_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT REFERENCES Student(student_id),
    goal TEXT,
    accommodation TEXT,
    review_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE students (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    grade_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE iep_plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT REFERENCES students(student_id),
    date_issued DATE,
    goals TEXT,
    accommodations TEXT
);
